overview: Mike leads Sales, Marketing, Quality Control and Quality Assurance at Voltaix. He joined Voltaix as Director of R&D in 1998 and has more than 20 years of experience in technical management and operations at several chemical companies, including American Cyanamid and Union Camp Corp. He holds a B.S. in Chemical Engineering from the University of Cincinnati. He is the recipient of several awards, including the American Chemical Society’s Hero of Chemistry in 1997 and the Thomas Alva Edison Patent Award in 1993. He has been granted 18 U.S. patents.
